property.name: Text
property.value: Attached to a Weapon asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Limit 1 per asset. Attached asset gains the Relic trait and takes up an arcane slot in addition to its others slots. ι When you perform a Fight action using attached asset, exhaust this card: Add the owner of this card's ά to your ή for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ά. ι When 1 or more [Bless] tokens would be removed from the chaos bag during a test: Seal them on Nephthys, instead. θ Exhaust Nephthys: Either release 3 [Bless] tokens sealed on her, or return 3 [Bless] tokens sealed on her to the token pool to deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play only during your turn. Reduce the cost to play The Stygian Eye by 1 for each [Curse] token in the chaos bag. Until the end of the round, you get +3 to each of your skills.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round. θ Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Hyperawareness: You get +1 έ or +1 ί for this skill test.

property.name: Text
property.value: Exceptional. You get +1 ά, +1 έ, +1 ή, and +1 ί. Forced – After Geas enters play: Make a promise using the following formula – "I shall not (draw/play/commit) any cards during each of my turns." If you break this promise while Geas is in play, discard it and add 10 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round. θ Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Hard Knocks: You get +1 ή or +1 ί for this skill test.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ά and +1 έ. You get –1 ά and –1 έ for each weakness beneath Ikiaq. ι When an investigator at your location draws a basic weakness, exhaust Ikiaq: Cancel that weakness's effects and place it facedown beneath Ikiaq. Its owner must draw it if Ikiaq leaves play. Card design by The Council at Arkham Nights 2018.

property.name: Text
property.value: Exceptional. Seal (up to X [Curse]). η Exhaust Flute of the Outer Gods and release 1 [Curse] token sealed on it: Choose a non-Elite enemy at your location. Either move the chosen enemy to a connecting location, or deal its damage to any enemy at its location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to play A Watchful Peace, search the chaos bag and/or cards in play for a total of 5 [Bless] tokens and return them to the token pool. Fast. Play when the "draw encounter cards" step of the mythos phase would begin. Skip this step of the mythos phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: "Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round. θ Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Dig Deep: You get +1 ά or +1 ί for this skill test."

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Seal (up to 3 [Curse]). If there are no tokens sealed on Favor of the Moon, discard it. ι When you would reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag, exhaust Favor of the Moon: Resolve a token sealed here instead, as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag. Then, gain 1 resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Seal (up to 3 [Bless]). If there are no tokens sealed on Favor of the Sun, discard it. ι When you would reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag, exhaust Favor of the Sun: Resolve a token sealed here instead, as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι When you draw a non-weakness treachery, take 1 damage and 1 horror: Cancel that card's revelation effect and place 1 resource on this card, as corruption. If this card has 3 or more corruption, remove it from the game. θ Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Either heal 1 damage and 1 horror, or remove 1 corruption from this card. Card design by the Impure at Arkham Nights 2019.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –1 for each key on this card. β: 0. Reveal an additional chaos token. If you reveal 1 or more [Curse] tokens during this test, you automatically fail. γ: –3. If you fail, place each key you control on your location. δ: –4. If you fail, add 1 [Curse] token to the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –2 for each key on this card. β: –2. Reveal an additional chaos token. If you reveal 1 or more [Curse] tokens during this test, you automatically fail. γ: –3. Place each key you control on your location. δ: –4. Add 2 [Curse] token to the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded or partially flooded location during your turn, take 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Add 2 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag. Check Campaign Log. — If a jailbreak is listed under "Memories Recovered" in your Campaign Log, spawn the set-aside Suspect enemy at a Third Floor location, or at the Grand Entryway if a Third Floor location is not in play (ignoring that enemy's revelation ability). Place the set-aside blue key on that enemy. — Otherwise, the lead investigator searches the encounter deck for a Cultist enemy and spawns it in a connecting location. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded or partially flooded location during your turn, take 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove 2 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag. Check Campaign Log. — If a jailbreak is listed under "Memories Recovered" in your Campaign Log, spawn the set-aside Suspect enemy at a Third Floor location, or at the Grand Entryway if a Third Floor location is not in play (ignoring that enemy's revelation ability). That enemy enters play exhausted. — Otherwise, nothing else happens.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded or partially flooded location during your turn, take 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Add 4 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded or partially flooded location during your turn, take 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove 4 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag. Choose an investigator to take control of the set-aside Thomas Dawson story asset. For the remainder of this scenario, Thomas Dawson does not take up an ally slot. That investigator may also take control of 1 spent key on the scenario card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded or partially flooded location during your turn, take 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator who has not resigned is defeated and suffer 1 mental trauma. In your Campaign Log, record Dagon has awakened. (-> R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Suspect enemy gets +1π health, loses aloof, and cannot be parleyed with. θ Spend the blue, red, white or yellow key: Discard each Obstacle card attached to your location. Objective – If each surviving investigator is at Grand Entryway and the investigators have "unlocked the entrance to the caves," advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a Suspect enemy is in play, remove it from the game. Remove each location other than Grand Entryway from the game (or add them to the victory display if they have Victory X and no clues on them), discarding each card at those locations. Shuffle the set-aside Tidal Tunnel locations and put each of them into play. Increase the flood level of each location. Shuffle each set-aside Syzygy and Tidal Alignment card into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Suspect enemy gets +1π health, loses aloof, and cannot be parleyed with. θ Spend the blue, red, white or yellow key: Discard each Obstacle card attached to your location. Objective – If each surviving investigator is at Grand Entryway and the investigators have "unlocked the final depths," advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put the set-aside Lair of Dagon location into play, fully flooded. Put the set-aside Dagon enemy into play at Lair of Dagon, (Deep in Slumber) side faceup. Check the current agenda. — If it is agenda 1a, add 10 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag. — If it is agenda 2a, add 5 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Suspect enemy gets +1π health, loses aloof, and cannot be parleyed with. θ Spend the blue, red, white or yellow key: Discard each Obstacle card attached to your location. Objective – Disrupt the Order's ritual by placing clues on this act. If there are 3π clues on this act, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: In your Campaign Log, record the order's ritual was disrupted. — If Dagon (Deep in Slumber) is in play, in your Campaign Log, record Dagon still slumbers. — If Dagon (Awakened and Enraged) is inplay or in the victory display, in your Campaign Log, record Dagon has awakened. (-> R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Grand Entryway is connected to each Cave location, and vice versa. η Resign. You've had enough of this place. η Investigators at the Grand Entryway spend the purple key and 3π clues, as a group: Remember that you have "unlocked the entrance to the caves."

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Hall of Blood is revealed: Place the set-aside red key on it. Forced – After you fail a skill test while investigating Hall of Blood: Take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend the red key: There is an audible click as the crest of blood fits into the stone altar. Put the set-aside Y'ha-nthlei Statue story asset into play under your control, Cursed side faceup. Forced – After hall of the Deep is revealed: Increase its flood level. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend the black key: Remember that you have "unlocked the third floor."

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Spend the blue, red, white, or yellow key: Choose 3 of the following – — Heal 1 damage. — Draw 2 cards. — Gain 3 resources. — Add 4 [Bless] tokens to the chaos bag. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you reveal Hall of Rebirth: Draw the set-aside Apostle of Dagon enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Investigators cannot move to Third Floor Hall unless an investigator has "unlocked the third floor."

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Hall of Silence is revealed: Place the set-aside purple key on it. Forced – After an investigator at this location fails a skill test: Add 1 [Curse] token to the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Doorway to the Depths is revealed: Place the set-aside green key on the location with the most clues. η Investigators at the Doorway to the Depths spend the green key and 3π clues, as a group: Remember that you have "unlocked the final depths."

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you enter Lair of Dagon: Test your lowest skill (3). If you, take 1 horror. η: Test ά (3) or ί (3). If you succeed, place 1 of your clues on the current act. You may spend 1 key to place 1 more of your clues on the current act. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dagon is slumbering. He cannot attack or engage, and is immune to investigator actions and player card effects. Forced – After an investigator at this location fails a skill test: Place 1 resource on Dagon. Then, if there are at least 1π +2 resources on Dagon, flip him. η Spend 1 key: Remove 1 resource from Dagon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Massive. Dagon gets +6π health. Forced – After an investigator at this location fails a skill test: Ready Dagon. Dagon attacks that investigator. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Apostle of Dagon gets +1π health. Forced – After Apostle of Dagon enters play: Place the set-aside black key on it. Forced – When an investigator deals 1 or more damage to Apostle of Dagon: Add 1 [Curse] token to the chaos bag. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey – Lowest ά. Hunter. Forced – After Cerenerian Deep One engages you: Add 2 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – If it is ... — ...act 1, test ί (3). — ...act 2, test ί (3), then ή (2). — ...act 3, test ί (3), then ή (2), then έ (2). For each of these skill tests you fail, take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Add 1 [Curse] token to the chaos bag. Test ά (4). If you fail, place 1 doom on each Cultist enemy and take 1 horror (2 horror instead if 1 or more [Curse] tokens were revealed during this test).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (4). If you fail, either choose and discard 2 cards from your hand or discard an asset you control (if 1 or more [Curse] tokens were revealed during this test, do both instead).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (3) (5 instead if your location is flooded). For each point you fail by, add 1 [Curse] token to the chaos bag (if you cannot, Heralds of the Deep gains surge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach to the nearest location without a Stone Barrier attached. If attached location is flooded, Stone Barrier gains surge. While Stone Barrier is ready, investigators cannot move out of attached location. η: Test ί (1), ή (2), or έ (3). If you succeed, exhaust Stone Barrier.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Y'ha-nthlei Statue and add 2 [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag: Deal 1 damage to a Humanoid enemy at your location. η: Spend the blue, white, red, or yellow key: Ready Y'ha-nthlei Statue and flip it to its other side.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Y'ha-nthlei Statue: Deal 1 damage to a Humanoid enemy at your location. θ Exhaust Y'ha-nthlei Statue: Remove 2 [Curse] tokens from the chaos bag and replace them with an equal number of [Bless] tokens.
